Introduction

Kang Seok Hwa is a South Korean singer and lyricist affiliated with OUI Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group WEi. Seokhwa initially gained attention through his participation in the survival shows "YG Treasure Box" and "Produce X 101." He debuted as the main vocalist of WEi on October 5, 2020, with the release of their first mini-album "Identity: First Sight."

In 2018, Seokhwa competed in YG Treasure Box, where he was eliminated in episode 9. Afterward, he left YG Entertainment and joined "Produce X 101" as an independent trainee. He was eliminated in episode 8, finishing in 35th place.
